text: Bangalaia thomensis is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae.BioLib.cz - Bangalaia thomensis. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. It was described by Stephan von Breuning in 1947. It is known from São Tomé and Cameroon.Tavakilian G. & Chevillotte H. (2018). Base de données Titan sur les Cerambycidés ou Longicornes. Bangalaia thomensis. Accessed: 21 January 2019 ==References== Category:Prosopocerini Category:Insects of Cameroon Category:Beetles of Africa Category:Beetles described in 1947
title: Bangalaia thomensis
